Room.Name: Vine Covered Side of Gorgon's Tower
Room.ShortDescription: You are midway up the side of Gorgon's Tower, climbing on heavy vines.
Room.LongDescription: The Nyyron Trail can be seen to the east, and further south is a burned farmhouse. The top of the tower is about the same distance as it is to the ground A stinging vapor comes from cracks in the stone, causing your eyes and lungs to burn. Acid oozes from the tower in places.
